Hi, I am a first-year PhD student in the [Intelligent Earth CDT](https://intelligent-earth.ox.ac.uk/home) program at the University of Oxford.
My current focus in on AI for materials discovery, especially to tackle environmental challenges. 
Previously, I worked on geometric machine learning in fields like neurobiology, molecular chemistry, and theoretical physics.
